english.segment1: Lick your wounds you death defier you love denier take another chance take another risk you fool because I don't even know you and i don't even care to you're all the same and you'll never change borne identity born for the role faceless selfish loveless soul you think you know it all you think you stand so tall over everyone above us all you prey on our kindness for all of your weakness and we won't be your scapegoat anymore lick your wounds and you'll never ever heal you death defier you'll never heal you love denier take another chance you fool.
